channel.title: Buying your banned character back
channel.description: someone mentioned this to me, is this true? what does it mean? do you get your character + items back or just the name?

item.title: Buying your banned character back
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:29, topic:382727”]So you’re effectively paying them to roll your account back in retrospect.

Hardly sounds worth it to me. Hell, it may not even be worth it to recover an account that had a ‘rare’ (lol) name – someone else has probably nabbed it.[/quote]If they at least kept rares it would be worth doing. So much for that income source Jagex!

Read full topic

item.title: Buying your banned character back
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

So you’re effectively paying them to roll your account back in retrospect.

Hardly sounds worth it to me. Hell, it may not even be worth it to recover an account that had a ‘rare’ (lol) name – someone else has probably nabbed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Buying your banned character back
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Under4545, post:27, topic:382727”]What I have heard on this is that Runescape divides the exp you had in each skill by 4.3 makes your cash stack to 1 gp, gets rid of almost all your banks wealth (party hats, masks, rares, etc.). I can’t remeber the rest. Im pretty sure there is a forum topic on the runescape forums that explains it. I personally think this is just another way for Jagex to make some quick cash.[/quote]If that’s correct, then there is no point whatsoever of paying for an account then.

Read full topic

item.title: Buying your banned character back
item.dc:creator: @Under4545 Under4545
item.description:
@Under4545 wrote:

What I have heard on this is that Runescape divides the exp you had in each skill by 4.3 makes your cash stack to 1 gp, gets rid of almost all your banks wealth (party hats, masks, rares, etc.). I can’t remeber the rest. Im pretty sure there is a forum topic on the runescape forums that explains it. I personally think this is just another way for Jagex to make some quick cash.

Read full topic

item.title: Buying your banned character back
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Ollie:

“Your user account has been banned from the Forums for breaking the rules in game. You will not be able to post on the Forums until this ban has ended or been lifted.”

You post from another account about the one you want reinstated.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Buying your banned character back
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“IBOutlet, post:23, topic:382727”]This thread is much better than emailing them, they just set it up yesterday.

RuneScape

RuneScape Forum - Community Forums for Clans, Feedback & Discussion

Join the discussion on the official RuneScape forum. Share your thoughts with the community, ask questions, find help, learn about events and much more.


I’d be replying to that on a throwaway something about “oh hai jagex I’m now playing as merchantrix btw can you unban silabsoft” does not sit well

Read full topic

item.title: Buying your banned character back
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

I did it a day or two ago and just got one of those typical Jagex customer support aren’t actually working right now responses. By that I mean, they sent back a generic email about how much I cared for my account but sorry it’s still banned

Let’s see how yours go!

Read full topic

item.title: Buying your banned character back
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

I have also sent in an email, will update post with response.

Read full topic

item.title: Buying your banned character back
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I recovered my password since I forgot it, and tried to appeal, which was promptly denied. So I sent them an email and am waiting for a response.

Read full topic

item.title: Buying your banned character back
item.dc:creator: @IBOutlet IBOutlet
item.description:
@IBOutlet wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:18, topic:382727”][quote author=BloodRayne link=topic=478517.msg3503581#msg3503581 date=1297965047]

Bot it, get it banned, buy it back, and sell it

They make it very specific in the email that they have the right to completely clean your account or reset your stats if you were banned for botting or gained the items illegitimately. Someone made a post on the official runescape forums claiming to have paid for their account back, but with the 12 99s they had prior to the ban being reset…
[/quote]
Well surely that’s just a complete scam? If they’re going to reset your account completely after you paid to get it back, all you’re actually paying for is the name.[/quote]
They erase everything that they think you gained with bots. If you completely botted everything then yes, it isn’t worth paying. But some people could have played legit and then started botting.

Read full topic

item.title: Buying your banned character back
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:16, topic:382727”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=478517.msg3503250#msg3503250 date=1297919106]
Bot it, get it banned, buy it back, and sell it
[/quote]

They make it very specific in the email that they have the right to completely clean your account or reset your stats if you were banned for botting or gained the items illegitimately. Someone made a post on the official runescape forums claiming to have paid for their account back, but with the 12 99s they had prior to the ban being reset…[/quote]
Well surely that’s just a complete scam? If they’re going to reset your account completely after you paid to get it back, all you’re actually paying for is the name.

Read full topic

item.title: Buying your banned character back
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

To many users. Maybe emailing them regarding your concern?

If I can get my account “tilit” back from 2001. It was deleted because tilit was considered a bad word back in rsc
Who knows what I have on that account.

Your account today will have the message centre but messages are only kept for 3 months at a time.
